entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
